question: Who of the following inaugurated the first health centre under Ayushman Bharat Scheme in Bijapur, recently?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the first health centre under Ayushman Bharat Scheme in Bijapur. He also inaugurated the first phase of the Bastar Internet scheme under which a 40,000-km-long network of fibre optics cable would be spread across the seven districts of the tribal region. The districts are Bijapur, Narayanpur, Bastar, Kanker, Kondagaon, Sukma and Dantewada.
